T02D2888:235b-1: badzra p'a ni mandal bi dhi:/
T02D2888:235b-3: phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2888:235b-4: dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02D2888:235b-5: bla ma la gus phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2888:235b-6: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2888:235b-7: de yi dkyil 'khor cho ga brtsam //
T02D2888:235b-8: dpal phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal
T02D2888:235b-9: 'byor pa'i don du dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di bsdu
T02D2888:235b-10: bar bya'o // de la sngon du bsnyen pa bya
T02D2888:235b-11: ba ni sgrub pa'i thabs las 'byung ba bzhin du
T02D2888:235b-12: bdag nyid lhar bskyed la snying po 'bum bzlas pa
T02D2888:235b-13: bar bya'o // bya pa'am / yang na ji srid
T02D2888:235b-14: mtshan ma thob par ma gyur gyi bar de srid
T02D2888:235b-15: du bsgom pa dang bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen
T02D2888:235b-16: bar bya'o // bya pa'am / pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2888:235b-17: de ltar bsnyen pa rdzogs nas sa'i cho ga bya
T02D2888:235b-18: bar bya'o // bya pa'am / pa'i cho ga'o // ste / gtsug lag khang dam /
T02D2888:235b-20: nags tshal la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su sa bslang ba dang /
T02D2888:235b-23: sa byin gyis brlab par byas te /
T02D2888:235b-24: de la bslang ba ni gnas kyi bdag po la bslang ba dang /
T02D2888:235b-25: mandal dang dri'i thig le dang /
T02D2888:235b-26: me tog gi tshom bu bya ste /
T02D2888:235b-27: mchod pa dang gtor ma bshams nas aom aa pra
T02D2888:235b-28: ti bi ka ra sha h'um dza: zhes bya ba
T02D2888:235b-29: dang / rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis brkyang
T02D2888:235b-30: la sa la reg par byas pas sa'i lha mo
T02D2888:235b-31: 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs la /
T02D2888:235b-32: sa'i lha mo mchod pa dang /
T02D2888:235b-33: de'i 'khor lo gtor ma byin nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2888:235b-34: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2888:235b-35: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
T02D2888:235b-36: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2888:235b-37: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2888:235b-38: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2888:235b-39: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02D2888:235b-40: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde //
T02D2888:235b-41: pham par bya ste dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2888:235b-42: zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod la /
T02D2888:235b-43: sa byin par bsams te mchod la gshegs su gsol //
T02D2888:236a-0: de nas sa sbyang pa ni @236a * //
T02D2888:236a-1: drag po dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2888:236a-2: 'dom gang nye 'khor du lte ba nub tsam mam pus mo nub tsam brkos la gseg ma dang /
T02D2888:236a-4: rus pa la sogs pa bsal la spos chus bran la /
T02D2888:236a-5: sa de nyid kyis bkang nas sa'i ltas brtag par bya ste /
T02D2888:236a-7: de'i rjes la sa bzung ba ni gdugs dang /
T02D2888:236a-9: bla re la sogs pa bres la sku gzugs bkram
T02D2888:236a-10: nas phyogs bzhir spos rgyun mi 'chad par btul bar
T02D2888:236a-11: bya'o // de nas lag pa g-yas pa der gtugs te /
T02D2888:236a-12: yi ge brgya pa bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste /
T02D2888:236a-13: sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs
T02D2888:236a-14: pa ni sa gzung ba dang byin gyis brlab pa
T02D2888:236a-17: // / de nas bdag nyid khrus bya zhing dris byugs la /
T02D2888:236a-18: gos sngon po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02D2888:236a-20: rgyan gdags shing rdo rje dril bur ldan pas gal te nus na smyung bar gnas pa'am /
T02D2888:236a-21: ma nus na zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2888:236a-22: de la re zhig sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D2888:236a-23: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02D2888:236a-24: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2888:236a-25: de'ang yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo
T02D2888:236a-26: rje chen po nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam pa khong
T02D2888:236a-27: stong bsam pa ni srung ba'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D2888:236a-28: de'i nang du bh'um las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa /
T02D2888:236a-29: rta babs dang bcas pa bskyed la /
T02D2888:236a-30: dbus su aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2888:236a-31: de nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D2888:236a-33: yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du byin gyis brlabs
T02D2888:236a-34: pa'i bar du byas la sa'i lha mo mchod nas
T02D2888:236a-35: gsol ba gdab pa'i bar du bya'o //
T02D2888:236a-36: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs pos mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2888:236a-37: mandal dbus dang phyogs bzhir ni /
T02D2888:236a-38: gos sngon can rigs lnga skad cig gis bsgoms la /
T02D2888:236a-39: lha la gsol ba gdab pa'i cho ga / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir //
T02D2888:236a-40: bdag gis dkyil 'khor sa bzung bas //
T02D2888:236a-41: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis //
T02D2888:236a-42: bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol //
T02D2888:236b-0: slob ma bzhi @236b yis phyogs bzhi nas gsol ba gdab pa'i tshig 'di dag go //
T02D2888:236b-1: rdo rje gos sngon rigs kyi gtso //
T02D2888:236b-2: mnyam pa'i dang las 'bar ba'i sku //
T02D2888:236b-3: zhe sdang chen po tshar gcod phyir //
T02D2888:236b-4: rdo rje rigs kyis bzung mdzod //
T02D2888:236b-5: rin chen gos sngon rigs kyi gtso //
T02D2888:236b-6: mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i sku //
T02D2888:236b-7: nga rgyal can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02D2888:236b-8: rin chen rigs kyi sa bzung mdzod //
T02D2888:236b-9: padma'i gos sngon rigs kyi gtso //
T02D2888:236b-10: mnyam pa'i dang las 'bar ba'i sku //
T02D2888:236b-11: 'dod chags can rnams gdul ba'i phyir //
T02D2888:236b-13: las kyi gos sngon rigs kyi gtso //
T02D2888:236b-14: mnyam pa'i ngang las 'bar ba'i sku //
T02D2888:236b-15: phrag dog can rnams gdul ba'i phyir //
T02D2888:236b-16: las kyi rigs kyi sa bzung mdzod //
T02D2888:236b-18: de nas mig g-yas par ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor //
T02D2888:236b-19: g-yon par ta las zla ba /
T02D2888:236b-20: rkang mthil du sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed nas langs
T02D2888:236b-21: te sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas bdag lha'i
T02D2888:236b-23: dbus kyi gtso bo nam mkhar bteg la khro bo'i bstod pa bya'o //
T02D2888:236b-25: chos dbyings stong pa gnyis med rang nyid las //
T02D2888:236b-26: 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshul yang mi spong zhing //
T02D2888:236b-27: thabs la mkhas pas 'jigs byed skur ston pa'i //
T02D2888:236b-28: khro chen 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2888:236b-29: bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil nas //
T02D2888:236b-30: dpa' bo stang stabs brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs //
T02D2888:236b-31: nyi zla 'bar ba'i spyan gyi sdang mig gis //
T02D2888:236b-32: bgegs dpung sreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2888:236b-33: ces brjod la bka' bsgo bar bya ste /
T02D2888:236b-34: dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i //
T02D2888:236b-35: lha la sogs pa'i bgegs tshogs kun nyon cig / nga ni gnas 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po 'bri //
T02D2888:236b-36: bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin 'byer bar gyis //
T02D2888:236b-37: ci steng yi bka' las 'das gyur na //
T02D2888:236b-38: ye shes can gyi rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis //
T02D2888:236b-39: spyi bo tshal pa brgyar ni 'gas 'gyur zhing //
T02D2888:236b-40: rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02D2888:236b-42: deng rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug che ge mo zhes
T02D2888:236b-43: bya bas rdzogs pa'i slob mche ge mo zhes bya
T02D2888:236b-44: ba byang chub tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang
T02D2888:237a-0: / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub thob @237a * //
T02D2888:237a-2: dpal phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2888:237a-3: chen po zhig rtsom gyis gang su rung ba sa
T02D2888:237a-4: phyogs 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang lha ma yin
T02D2888:237a-13: rig 'dzin la sogs pa rgan po dang /
T02D2888:237a-16: g-yog tu bcas pa 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du
T02D2888:237a-17: dengs shig / de ltar phyag na rdo rje'i bka'
T02D2888:237a-18: thos pas myur ba nyid du dengs shig / gang
T02D2888:237a-19: dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni nga'i ye shes
T02D2888:237a-20: kyi rdo rje chen po kun du 'bar ba 'dis
T02D2888:237a-21: mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par gyur ta re
T02D2888:237a-23: rdo rje chen po'i gar dang /
T02D2888:237a-24: rdo rje chen po'i 'gros kyis sa gzhi lan gsum bskor zhing /
T02D2888:237a-25: rang gi lus las khro bo'i tshogs phyung la sdang ba thams cad bskrad par bsam mo //
T02D2888:237a-26: de nas yi ge h'um gis srung ba'i 'khor lo byas la /
T02D2888:237a-27: phur bu lnga stong phyag na rdo rje smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bskyed nas /
T02D2888:237a-28: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bighn'a bandha
T02D2888:237a-29: h'um phat ces bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la
T02D2888:237a-30: / dbus dang grva bzhir aom gha gha gha ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D2888:237a-31: sarba du sht'a na h'um phat /
T02D2888:237a-32: k'i l'a ya k'i l'a ya sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02D2888:237a-33: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i li k'i l'a ya badzra dha ra a'adzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D2888:237a-34: k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i l'a ya h'um phat ces bya bas btab la /
T02D2888:237a-35: aom badzra mungga ra a'a ko ta ya h'um phat ces bya bas brdung bar bya'o //
T02D2888:237a-36: de nas srung skud bcing ba dang /
T02D2888:237a-37: gu gul gyis bdugs pa dang /
T02D2888:237a-38: me tog phreng ba btags shing dri'i thig le byas nas byams pa'i go cha bskon par bya'o //
T02D2888:237a-39: de nas dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam lnga dang /
T02D2888:237a-40: snying po bzlas pa'i dri chus byugs la /
T02D2888:237a-41: dbus su dri'i thig le byas te me tog gi
T02D2888:237a-42: tshom bu bkram nas dza: h'um bam ho'i sngags kyis
T02D2888:237a-43: bteg pa'i lta bzhugs su gsol lo /
T02D2888:237a-44: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang /
T02D2888:237a-46: yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du byin gyis brlabs /
T02D2888:237a-49: bstod pa byas nas snyan gsan dbab par bya ste /
T02D2888:237a-50: phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2888:237a-51: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2888:237b-0: slob ma kun la @237b brtse ba dang //
T02D2888:237b-1: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2888:237b-3: bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la //
T02D2888:237b-4: de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs //
T02D2888:237b-5: zhes lan sum brjod par bya ste /
T02D2888:237b-6: lha lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2888:237b-7: de nas bum pa gnyis legs par bkrus na mas mgul pa bcings te /
T02D2888:237b-8: ldum bcas lcug mas kha brgyan la /
T02D2888:237b-11: 'bru lnga bcug nas lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D2888:237b-12: de nas bum pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pas bsangs nas /
T02D2888:237b-13: bhr'um las gzhal yas khang dang /
T02D2888:237b-14: bam las 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho dang /
T02D2888:237b-15: hr'i: las sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D2888:237b-16: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas de'i steng du h'um las phyag na rdo rje bskyed de /
T02D2888:237b-17: ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
T02D2888:237b-22: bstod pa byas nas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02D2888:237b-23: gos gtsang ma skabs la bzhag ste /
T02D2888:237b-24: phyi de zhag gsum du bzlas pa bya ste bum pa lhag bar gnas pa'o //
T02D2888:237b-25: de nas 'byor pa yod na sbyin sreg gi mchod pa bya'o //
T02D2888:237b-26: de nas gtor ma'i cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du gtor ma btang nas /
T02D2888:237b-27: slob ma lhag par gnas pa bya ste /
T02D2888:237b-28: khrus byas la me tog lag tu thogs te slob
T02D2888:237b-29: dpon gyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa
T02D2888:237b-31: dga' chen khyod la bdag dga'o //
T02D2888:237b-32: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2888:237b-33: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i //
T02D2888:237b-34: mgon po chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2888:237b-35: dam tshig chen po stsal du gsol //
T02D2888:237b-36: byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2888:237b-37: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2888:237b-38: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2888:237b-39: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D2888:237b-40: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D2888:237b-41: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02D2888:237b-42: gsang sngags tshul chen spyod pa dag / khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D2888:237b-43: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te //
T02D2888:237b-44: dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D2888:237b-45: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D2888:237b-46: rdo rje gsang sngags 'di bsgoms pas //
T02D2888:237b-47: dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du //
T02D2888:237b-48: thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan ma brnyes //
T02D2888:238a-2: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D2888:238a-3: bdud sde shin tu mi bzang pa'i //
T02D2888:238a-4: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02D2888:238a-7: des na kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2888:238a-8: bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig / de nas lhar bskyed nas mchod pa bya ste /
T02D2888:238a-12: zab cing rgya che ba'i chos bshad par bya ste /
T02D2888:238a-13: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02D2888:238a-14: au dum w'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D2888:238a-15: brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2888:238a-16: gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D2888:238a-17: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D2888:238a-18: gang gis mnyam med sems can don //
T02D2888:238a-19: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2888:238a-20: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02D2888:238a-21: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
T02D2888:238a-23: gzhan yang theg pa chen po yi //
T02D2888:238a-24: lam mchog 'di ni dang la dang ldan //
T02D2888:238a-25: khyed rnams der ni dong pas na //
T02D2888:238a-26: thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras bu thob //
T02D2888:238a-27: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2888:238a-28: des na bu yis brtson par gyis //
T02D2888:238a-29: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o /
T02D2888:238a-30: de ltar lhag par gnas par byas nas //
T02D2888:238a-31: nang par nyi ma shar ba dang mchod pa bshams la /
T02D2888:238a-33: sa gzhi ba'i rnam pa lnga dang dri chen pos
T02D2888:238a-34: byugs nas thig skud byin gyis brlabs la cho ga
T02D2888:238a-36: da nas tshon dgye bar bya ste /
T02D2888:238a-37: tshon byin gyis brlabs la dbus su padma dang zla
T02D2888:238a-38: ba'i gdan la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris pa
T02D2888:238a-39: dang / phyogs kyi rim par tshon dgye ba dang /
T02D2888:238a-40: rtsig pa la phyi rim dkar po dang /
T02D2888:238a-46: rin po che'i pha gu ser po dang /
T02D2888:238a-47: dra ba dra phyed nag po /
T02D2888:238a-50: rdo rje me ri dang bcas par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2888:238a-51: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas dgongs ka'i dus su
T02D2888:238a-52: mchod rdzas rnams bsags nas bdag nyid stan bde ba
T02D2888:238a-53: la 'dug ste / lha'i nga rgyal gyis dkyil 'khor bteg la yid kyis nang du zhugs te /
T02D2888:238b-0: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir lan bdun @238b bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2888:238b-1: de nas me tog gi phreng ba dor la slar rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2888:238b-2: de nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la mdun gyi lha
T02D2888:238b-3: yang sa bon gyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa
T02D2888:238b-4: las rdo rje las 'od zer spro bsdu byas nas
T02D2888:238b-5: / lhar bskyed la ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2888:238b-6: mchod pa rgyas par phul bstod pa byas nas bum par bcug ste /
T02D2888:238b-7: bzlas pa byas nas chur zhu ba las sku khrus gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2888:238b-8: de nas sbyin sreg bya ba dang /
T02D2888:238b-9: gtor ma btang nas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2888:238b-10: de nas bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga dang /
T02D2888:238b-11: slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga yang tshul bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2888:238b-12: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha la phyag byas la /
T02D2888:238b-13: gnang ba nod par bya ste /
T02D2888:238b-14: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas ni //
T02D2888:238b-15: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02D2888:238b-16: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2888:238b-18: de nas rdo rje slob ma yi //
T02D2888:238b-19: spyod lam legs par gsungs pa yi //
T02D2888:238b-20: bla ma chen po khyed kyis ni //
T02D2888:238b-21: byang chub chen po'i lam ston pa'i //
T02D2888:238b-22: bsam gyis mi khyab dam chos snod //
T02D2888:238b-23: dbang bskur dam pa mdzad du gsol //
T02D2888:238b-27: lhar bskyed cing las thams cad pa'i bum pas khrus bya ba dang /
T02D2888:238b-29: lha'i dam tshig bsgrag pa ni /
T02D2888:238b-30: mthu stobs phyag na rdo rje ni //
T02D2888:238b-31: khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs //
T02D2888:238b-32: rtag tu yi dam lha yin gyi //
T02D2888:238b-33: tshul 'di smra bar ma byed cig / gal te tshul 'di smras na yang //
T02D2888:238b-34: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2888:238b-36: de nas tsandan gur gum la sogs pa'i chu khyor bar blugs la /
T02D2888:238b-37: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D2888:238b-38: dam tshig 'das na tshig par byed //
T02D2888:238b-39: gal te gsang sngags dngos grub ni //
T02D2888:238b-42: de nas slob dpon gyis dam tshig bsgrags te /
T02D2888:238b-43: da ni phyag na rdo rje ste //
T02D2888:238b-44: da yis bsgo ba'i las nyon cig / ma mos
T02D2888:238b-45: brnyas par ma byed cig / gal te khyod kyis
T02D2888:238b-46: brnyas na ni // dam tshig 'di yis sreg par byed //
T02D2888:238b-47: tsha ba chen po'i gnas su bsreg / ces pa'o //
T02D2888:238b-49: de nas rdzas kyi dud pa btang /
T02D2888:238b-50: rdo rje slob dpon thugs ka nas //
T02D2888:238b-51: kha dog dmar ba'i aa bton nas //
T02D2888:238b-52: slob ma'i snying gar gzhug par bya //
T02D2888:239a-0: @239a * // slob ma rnams kyis bde ba bsgom //
T02D2888:239a-1: 'phar dang ldeg pa'i rtags byung na //
T02D2888:239a-2: de nyid brtan pa'i yan lag bya //
T02D2888:239a-6: dkyil 'khor lta ba byas nas lhar bskyed la /
T02D2888:239a-7: rang bzhin rnam dag bdag nyid las //
T02D2888:239a-8: dpa' bo dbang phyug ma yi gnas //
T02D2888:239a-9: dri med rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2888:239a-10: bu khyod kyis ni blta bar gyis //
T02D2888:239a-11: gdong g-yogs bkrol te 'khor lo'i lha //
T02D2888:239a-12: de bzhin nyid ni bstan par bya //
T02D2888:239a-13: gtso bo sgo mar bas pa bstan //
T02D2888:239a-18: ming gi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2888:239a-19: de nas sku gsung thugs kyi brtul zhugs la sogs pa bskur ro //
T02D2888:239a-21: yon thul nas ni gsol gdab bya //
T02D2888:239a-22: bum pa'i chu kun bsdus nas bya //
T02D2888:239a-23: slob ma la ni dbang bskur bya //
T02D2888:239a-24: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas bas //
T02D2888:239a-25: ji ltar phul bas mchod pa che //
T02D2888:239a-26: bdag kyang bsgral ba'i don du ni //
T02D2888:239a-27: nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02D2888:239a-29: de nas bum pa 'di dbang bskur te /
T02D2888:239a-30: rdo rje dbang skur chen po ni //
T02D2888:239a-31: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pas //
T02D2888:239a-32: gsang gsum gzhi las byung ba yi //
T02D2888:239a-33: rdo rje gos sngon chu dbang sbyin //
T02D2888:239a-34: aom badzra n'i l'am ba ra dha ra aa bhi shinytsa mi /
T02D2888:239a-35: de nas dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur te /
T02D2888:239a-36: sangs rgyas yon tan las byung ba'i //
T02D2888:239a-37: yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba che //
T02D2888:239a-38: bsams pa thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D2888:239a-39: rin chen gos sngon dbang bskur ro //
T02D2888:239a-40: aom ratna mu ku ta aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D2888:239a-41: de nas rdo rje'i dbang bskur te //
T02D2888:239a-42: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2888:239a-43: de ring khyod la bskur byas pas //
T02D2888:239a-44: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D2888:239a-45: padma'i gos sngon rdo rje zung //
T02D2888:239a-46: aom padma n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni aa bhi shinytsa mi /
T02D2888:239a-47: de nas dril bu'i dbang bskur te //
T02D2888:239a-48: chos kun sgyu ma'i sgra sgrogs te //
T02D2888:239a-49: stong pa'i don las sad par byed //
T02D2888:239a-50: shes rab dril bu'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D2888:239a-51: las kyi gos dbang thob par shog / aom karma
T02D2888:239a-52: n'i l'am bar dha r'a dhi pa ti stvam aa
T02D2888:239a-53: phi shinyts'a mi / de nas ming gi dbang bskur te //
T02D2888:239a-54: rdo rje'i ming ni bla med pas //
T02D2888:239a-55: cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pas //
T02D2888:239a-56: bla med byang chub nges thob pas //
T02D2888:239a-57: bde gshegs gos sngon dbang thob shog / aom buddha
T02D2888:239a-58: n'i l'am la ra dha ra n'a ma aa bhi
T02D2888:239b-0: @239b shinyts'a mi // de nas phyir mi ldog pa rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur te /
T02D2888:239b-2: de steng slob ma bzhag nas ni //
T02D2888:239b-3: tshig gis gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02D2888:239b-4: mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang stsol cig / dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang //
T02D2888:239b-5: sngags dang phyag rgya'i de nyid rnams //
T02D2888:239b-6: bdag nyid slob dpon bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D2888:239b-7: de nas bum chus dbang bskur te //
T02D2888:239b-8: gsang ba byang chub sems kyi chu //
T02D2888:239b-9: lha yi chu ni dag pa ste //
T02D2888:239b-10: dri med rdo rje chu yi dbang //
T02D2888:239b-11: rdo rje rigs mchog chu dbang sbyin //
T02D2888:239b-12: rdo rje dam tshig sbyin te /
T02D2888:239b-13: h'um thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2888:239b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2888:239b-15: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2888:239b-16: rdo rje dang po'i bdag po'i gtso //
T02D2888:239b-17: yang dag thog ma med pa yi //
T02D2888:239b-18: skyes bu chen po bcom ldan 'das /
T02D2888:239b-19: aom badzra aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D2888:239b-20: dril bu'i dam tshig sbyin te /
T02D2888:239b-21: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2888:239b-23: rtag tu khyod kyis kyang zungs te //
T02D2888:239b-24: rgyal ba'i byang chub mchog tu bzhed //
T02D2888:239b-25: aom badzra d'apti drishti aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D2888:239b-26: phyag rgya'i dam tshig sbyin te /
T02D2888:239b-27: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgya //
T02D2888:239b-28: mi phyed rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2888:239b-29: 'khyud pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya ste //
T02D2888:239b-30: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2888:239b-31: aom k'a ya mu tra aa bhi shinytsa mi /
T02D2888:239b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi ni de nyid dang //
T02D2888:239b-33: slob dpon de nyid rab tu sbyin //
T02D2888:239b-34: de ba mandal gu ru aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D2888:239b-35: de la lha'i gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D2888:239b-36: sems can rnams la phan don phyir //
T02D2888:239b-37: 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du //
T02D2888:239b-39: de ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2888:239b-40: rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
T02D2888:239b-41: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2888:239b-42: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02D2888:239b-43: rtag tu khyod kyis kyang bzung ste //
T02D2888:239b-44: lag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D2888:239b-45: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tishtha sa ma ya /
T02D2888:239b-46: aa ti de sha stvam dha ra ya mi badzra
T02D2888:239b-47: satva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brtul zhugs sbyin
T02D2888:239b-48: no // de nas slob dpon gtso bor bsgoms te /
T02D2888:239b-49: chos gos gyon pa'i tha ma lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis snying gar bzung la /
T02D2888:239b-50: lag pa g-yas pas mchod sbyin du byas //
T02D2888:239b-51: kye 'dod chags rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2888:240a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2888:240a-4: 'phags pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang dag pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o //
T02D2888:240a-5: mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mthu dang /
T02D2888:240a-6: sngags kyi mthu nges par 'ong gis dad par gyis shig ces lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D2888:240a-7: dkyil 'khor cho ga sbyar ba yis //
T02D2888:240a-8: dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun //
T02D2888:240a-9: phyag na rdo rje thob nas ni //
T02D2888:240a-10: 'gro don ma lus byed par shog / dpal phyag
T02D2888:240a-11: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / slob dpon
